name: 鄭以旋
objective: The course is designed for first-year, non-native English speaking students to strengthen their English language skills including reading, listening, speaking and writing.
remarks:
本學期原則採實體授課方式； 因應疫情警戒標準，本學期教學及授課方式請依照學校網頁所公布之訊息為準： (https://oaa.ntut.edu.tw/p/404-1008-98622.php?Lang=zh-tw)
Online courses will be conducted here - https://meet.google.com/ecz-jamj-ozu.
